Name: Bulbasaur
Flavor Text: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.

Name: Ivysaur
EV Values: 1 Sp. Attack Point(s)1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
Flavor Text: The bud on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.

Name: Venusaur
EV Values: 2 Sp. Attack Point(s)1 Sp. Defense Point(s)

Name: Charmander
Flavor Text: The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places.

Name: Charmeleon
Flavor Text: Tough fights could excite this Pokémon. When excited, it may breathe out bluish-white flames.

Name: Squirtle
Flavor Text: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

Name: Wartortle
Flavor Text: When tapped on its head, this Pokémon will pull it in, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.
